title: To Libertarians, Rand Paul Is 'Libertarian-Ish'
teaser: Sen. Rand Paul of Kentucky said he's likely to announce whether he'll run in 2016 in the next two months. NPR's Scott Simon talks to Nick Gillespie of Reason.com about the libertarian landscape.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
